name: Moon Mullican
description:
'''Aubrey Wilson Mullican''' (March 29, 1909 â€“ January 1, 1967), known professionally as '''Moon Mullican''' and nicknamed "King of the Hillbilly Piano Players", was an American [[country and western]] singer, songwriter, and pianist. He was associated with the hillbilly boogie style which influenced [[rockabilly]]. [[Jerry Lee Lewis]] cited him as a major influence on his own singing and piano playing.

Mullican once stated, "We gotta play music that'll make them goddamn beer bottles bounce on the table".
